alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 29 at 2:26PM CDT until October 30 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Boone and Newton Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations
